column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Julio - Thanks for your review. I'm glad you have noticed improvement. If you have ever worked in the restaurant industry
column2: you would know that change and improvement does not come without a lot of pain
column4: sweat and tears. We may never be the best in everyone's eyes
column5: but it is still the goal we will strive for on a daily basis. As a wise man once told me
column6: sometimes the goals worth striving for the most are the ones that are unattainable. Thank you again
column7: and we wish you happiness and prosperity in 2017.
